column2: "My my, look who it is. Do you need something from Lisa?"
"Lisa is taking a casual stroll, shooting anything that moves."
"All the fuss up on the ship has died down, it's so boring, you know?"
"Is Lisa having as much fun down here? Well, that's a complicated question."
"There are the big, black giants, and Darkers ... so many targets for Lisa to shoot! But, but..."
"The big white giants worship Lisa. Why? Why!?"
"Especially when Lisa shoots down the big black giants, they start cheering... It makes Lisa sick."
"So Lisa tried shooting them too... and they kept cheering anyway!! Has Lisa finally met her match!?"
"Oh well~ Since Lisa can shoot at anything and nobody gets mad, you could say she feels right at home. Ufufufu!"
